programme.title: Barbara McClintock
programme.short_synopsis: Barbara McClintock's research into genes, and her acknowledgement as a great scientist.
programme.medium_synopsis: A profile of Nobel Prize winning scientist Barbara McClintock, and her biological and biochemical research that lead to an advanced understanding of the behaviour of genes.
